function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited accessibility to active travel options such as walking and cycling","Impact":"Reduced public health, increased reliance on public transport, and limited mobility for certain demographics","Mitigation":"Invest in infrastructure for accessibility, address cultural and social barriers, and provide support for bicycle ownership and maintenance","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies, community engagement platforms, public health programs","People":"Those with limited mobility, women, ethnic minorities","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased confidence in the safety of public transport","Impact":"Reduced use of public transport, increased congestion, negative impact on air quality, limited transport options for those without private cars","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures and communication to build confidence in public transport, improve disinfection protocols, and provide alternatives for those who rely on public transport","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, real-time communication systems, alternative transport options","People":"General public, those without private cars","Owner":"Transport authorities, government agencies, public transport operators"}]}
